external_references.description: Costa, F. (2022, May 1). RaaS AvosLocker Incident Response Analysis. Retrieved January 11, 2023.
Venere, G. Neal, C. (2022, June 21). Avos ransomware group expands with new attack arsenal. Retrieved January 11, 2023.

objects.description: During [C0018](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0018), the threat actors downloaded additional tools, such as [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002) and [Sliver](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0633), as well as [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) and [AvosLocker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1053) ransomware onto the victim network.(Citation: Cisco Talos Avos Jun 2022)(Citation: Costa AvosLocker May 2022)
